main event: A civilian witness observed a UFO in Decatur, Illinois on September 20, 1968, describing it as a white light moving slowly in the sky.
interesting points: The object was observed for 25 minutes and initially thought to be a star or telescope., The object changed altitude from 25 degrees to about 60 degrees before disappearing., It was considered to be about 40 feet in diameter and round or cap-shaped., Witnesses attempted to use binoculars for a closer look but lost sight of the object., The object emitted no sound or flashing lights during the observation.
sighted object: one white light in the sky
witness description: civilian observers including the witness's wife and children
